categoryDescription: Commands used to manage the guild or configure the bot

create.description: Create a backup of your server. If the server has 5 or more backups, the oldest one will be deleted.

get.description: Get one backup or a list of backups for this guild.

id.description: The backup ID to look for.

load.description: Load a backup. CAUTION: this erases all server data! Use the option "no_clear" to avoid that.

id.description: The backup ID you want to load. Use the "get" subcommand to view a list of IDs.

no_clear.description: If set to true, will only overwrite existing data (e.g. channels won't get deleted).

create.success:
The backup with the ID {id} has been created successfully!
Use {cmd} for more information about the backup.

delete.noPerm: Only the guild owner can delete backups!

get.embedDescription: The following backups were found, sorted by date:
get.noneFound: No backups were found for this server.
get.oneNotFound: No backup was found with that ID!

load.cancelled: Loading the backup has been cancelled.
load.enableDMs: Please enable the bot to send you DMs so that you can see the loading status.
load.error: An error occurred while trying to load the backup.
load.loadingEmbedDescription:
Applying backup to the server.
This may take a while, depending on the size of the backup.
load.noPerm: Only the guild owner can load backups!
load.noneFound: No backup has been found for this guild!
load.overwriteWarningDescription:
This action will delete most of your server! This includes roles, webhooks, channels, and emojis.
If you are sure you want to do this, click "Yes". Click "No" to cancel.
You might also want to create a backup before loading, just to be safe.
load.success: Successfully loaded the backup with id {id}.

add_prefix.description: Add another prefix for the bot.

case_insensitive.description: Should the case of the prefix be ignored?

new_prefix.description: the new bot prefix for this guild

autopublish.description: automatically publish everything anyone in any announcement channel says.

enabled.description: automatically publish everything anyone in any announcement channel says.

birthday.description: Configure the birthday channel and message.

language.description: In which language should the boy reply?

logger.description: Log actions that the audit log cannot log

action.description: The action you want to log

channel.description: The channel you want to send the log message to

enabled.description: Enable (true) or disable (false) logging the action

remove_prefix.description: Remove a prefix for the bot.

prefix.description: the prefix to remove for this guild

serverbackup.description: Manage options for your server backups.

allowed_to_load.description: Change who is allowed to load server backups.

case_insensitive.description: Should the case of the prefix be ignored?

new_prefix.description: the new bot prefix for this guild

toggle_command.description: Allow/Disallow roles/channels/members from running a specific command.

channel_1.description: The channel for which you want to toggle the command

channel_2.description: The channel for which you want to toggle the command

channel_3.description: The channel for which you want to toggle the command

channel_4.description: The channel for which you want to toggle the command

channel_5.description: The channel for which you want to toggle the command

channel_6.description: The channel for which you want to toggle the command

command.description: The command you want to toggle.

get.description: Get a list of disallowed roles/channels/members for that command instead.

member_1.description: The member for which you want to toggle the command

member_2.description: The member for which you want to toggle the command

member_3.description: The member for which you want to toggle the command

member_4.description: The member for which you want to toggle the command

member_5.description: The member for which you want to toggle the command

member_6.description: The member for which you want to toggle the command

role_1.description: The role for which you want to toggle the command

role_2.description: The role for which you want to toggle the command

role_3.description: The role for which you want to toggle the command

role_4.description: The role for which you want to toggle the command

role_5.description: The role for which you want to toggle the command

role_6.description: The role for which you want to toggle the command

wordcounter.description: Enable (true) or disable (false) counting words in all user messages for stats.

enabled.description: Count the amount of words members sent for statistics.

addPrefix.limitReached: You cannot add more prefixes! Try removing unused ones first.
addPrefix.saved: {prefix} has been added as additional prefix.

language.embedDescription: The language has been set to {lang}.

logger.disabled: Logs for {action} will no longer be sent.
logger.enabled: Logs for {action} will be sent to {channel}.
logger.noChannel: You did not specify a text channel to send the log to!
logger.noEnabled: You need to use the `enabled` option to set all actions at once!

setPrefix.saved: My prefix has been changed to {prefix}.

toggleCommand.embedDescription:
The following amount of roles/channels/members have been changed:
||View all disallowed roles/channels/members by using {commandMention} with the `get` option.||
toggleCommand.embedFooterText: This setting does not affect the guild's owner.
toggleCommand.isDisabled: The {command} command is disabled for all members. You can re-enable it by running {commandMention} without specifying any role, channel or member.

list.embedDescription: No roles, channels or members are currently disallowed.

toggleCommand.notFound: This is not a valid command!

setup.useDashboard: Use the dashboard ({link}) to modify this setting.
